diff_act: 3.maintain the new state of the appliance
4.resume the default settings for the appliance's power switch

regen.absent_element: indication of when default settings will resume after manual switch change
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the user when default settings will resume after a manual power switch change

label: When a manual set state of power ends, the default setting will be used for the next time period.
